card.name: Sneaking Dile
card.text: Sneaking Dile costs {2} less to cast if an opponent discarded this turn or a creature you controlled died this turn. Skulk {4}{u}: Draw the bottom card of your library.

card.name: Secret Wrangler
card.text: Secret Wrangler gets +1/+1 for each of your opponents' revealed cards. Put a card from your hand on the bottom of your library: Secret Wranger gains hexproof until end of turn.

card.name: Ambitious Contortionist
card.text: Whenever Ambitious Contortionist deals combat damage to a player, they may lose 2 life. If they don't, they reveal the top card of their library and one from their hand. {1}{b}: Ambitious Contortionist gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Secret-Gorger
card.text: Flying Players have no maximum hand size. Whenever Secret-Gorger deals combat damage, draw a card. The defending player draws a card and reveals it.

card.name: Clandestilla
Fade to Mist
card.text: Target opponent loses life and you gain life equal to the number of revealed cards in your hand and deck. Unreveal a card in your hand, then draw a card and put a card from your hand on the bottom of your library.

card.name: Nimble Concealment
card.text: Unreveal a card in your hand, then draw a card and put a card from your hand on the bottom of your library. Cycling {2}

card.name: Shaming Nymph
card.text: Exploit Shaming Nymph gets +1/+1 whenever it attacks alone. When Shaming Nymph exploits a creature, target opponent reveals a card if able. Target creature they control gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Public Flogging
card.text: Transparent Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn. If its controller pays {3}, it gets -1/-1 until end of turn instead.

card.name: Mounting Storm
card.text: Transparent Put target creature with mana value 3 or less on the top of its owner's library. Rivalstorm (Make a copy of this spell for each spell your opponent has cast before it this turn.)

card.name: Storm of Tears
card.text: Kicker - reveal a card from your hand. Tap up to two target creatures. If this spell was kicked, put a stun counter on one of them.

card.name: Blundering Ninja
card.text: Transparent, Ninjutsu {u} Blundering Ninja enters with a stun counter on it if it's tapped.

card.name: Pure-Mind Trainee
card.text: You may reveal Pure-Mind Trainee as it is put into your hand. If you do, scry 2. Pure-Mind Trainee enters with a +1/+1 counter on it if it was not revealed when it was put into your hand.

card.name: Branching Mutant
card.text: Reach, Adapt 3 {2}{g}{u} Branching Mutant can block an additional creature for each +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Haughty Gamble
card.text: Target opponent may discard a card and reveal another. If they don't, you each reveal a card at the same time. This spell deals damage equal to the difference in mana value to whoever had the card with lesser mana value.

card.name: Riling Pyrodevil
card.text: Pop-up - {1}{r}, Reveal a card Backup 1 Haste

card.name: Clumsy Secretary
card.text: Haste Whenever Clumsy Secretary attacks a player, you may shuffle a random revealed card from your hand back into your library and draw a card. If you do, it deals 1 damage to that player.

card.name: Tactless Show-Host
card.text: {r}, {t}: Target opponent reveals the top card of their library. If it's a land, they put it into their hand. Otherwise, Tactless Show-Host deals 1 damage to them. Tactless Show-Host gets +2/+2 as long as it's attacking a player whose entire hand is revealed. (An empty hand is fully revealed.)

card.name: Exposé
card.text: You choose two cards from target opponent's hand and they reveal them. Exile target revealed card in their hand until Exposé leaves the battlefield. (Then it returns to their hand.) {4}: Sacrifice Exposé. Its controller draws a card. Any player may activate this ability.

card.name: Mind-Read
card.text: Choose 1: - Target player reveals an unrevealed card from their hand and you draw a card. - Put target revealed card from a player's hand on the bottom of their library. They draw a card and reveal it.

card.name: Show of Power
card.text: As an additional cost to this spell, reveal a creature card from your hand. Spree - {g} - Target creature you control gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn. {1}{g} - Target creature you control gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the revealed creature's power.

card.name: Obliging Confession
card.text: Reveal any number of cards in your hand. Target opponent reveals that many unrevealed cards (or as many as they can). Obliging Confession deals damage equal to them equal to the number of revealed cards in their hand.

card.name: Excitable Weird
Celebratory Giant
card.text: Whenever another creature enters under your control, Celebratory Giant deals 1 damage to each creature without flying. Pop-up costs of spells and spells with backup you cast are reduced by {1}.

card.name: Stone-Glare Officer
card.text: Flying Alternate costs can't be used to pay for spells opponents cast so long as Stone-Glare Officer is untapped. (An alternative cost is any cost that isn't spending mana to pay for the base mana cost. Cost reduction abilities such as convoke are not alternative costs.)

card.name: Headfirst Alpakon
Pay in Confidence
card.text: Reveal target card from your hand. Add X mana of any one color, where X is the number of non-colorless, non-generic symbols in its mana cost.

card.name: Preemptive Funeral
card.text: As an additional cost to casting this spell, sacrifice a creature. Mill the top 4 cards of your library. Then choose one, where X is the sacrificed creature's mana value: - Cast a creature from among them with mana value at most X. - Gain X life.

card.name: Open Burial
card.text: This spell costs {2} less to cast for each card you reveal or and {1} less for each card you exile from your graveyard as you cast it. Exile target land you control, then return it to the battlefield under your control. Untap it. Return target creature from a graveyard under your control with a finality counter. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Exposed Metal
card.text: Target opponent reveals a card of your choice. If it's an artifact, you may have them discard it. If it wasn't discarded this way, you may destroy target artifact.

card.name: Dead On Sight

card.name: Kickback

card.name: Evaporating Wish

When Evaporating Wish is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, add {u}{r} and distribute up to three prowess counters on up to three target creatures you control. Exile Evaporating Wish from your hand: add {u}{r}.

card.text: Target opponent reveals a card. Tap target creature they control.

card.text: Reveal an unrevealed card from your hand: untap Cocky Rooster. It gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: A Good Cry
card.text: Choose 1: - Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Tap it. - Target creature you control gets -2/-2 until end of turn and target creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn.

card.name: Hall of Chimes
card.text: {t}: Add {c}. {t}, tap a creature you control: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Extentoad
card.text: Reach Duck - target creature Extentoad is ducking behind gains reach and +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Daycare Grand Opening
card.text: Affinity for creatures with duck Prevent all damage dealt to creatures you control this turn. Make 3 1/1 green and white Alpaca Citizen creature tokens.

card.name: Political Divination
card.text: Target opponent separates the top three cards of your library into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other onto the bottom of your library in a random order. Horde 3 - If you control at least 3 creatures, add {u}.

card.name: Draining Relationship
card.text: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature attacks, defending player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. Enchanted creature has +1/+1.

card.name: Crystal, Naturalist
card.text: Whenever a creature enters under your control, gain 1 life. As long as your life total is 5 or more above your starting life total, creatures you control get +1/+1.

card.name: Darkest Heart
card.text: Exploit When Darkest Heart exploits a creature, target opponent discards a card. {1}{b}, sacrifice Darkest Heart: destroy target creature or planeswalker with mana cost less than or equal to your devotion to black.

card.name: Let Go
card.text: Return target attacking creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Never Too Late
card.text: Exile target blocked creature. Flashback {3}{w}{w}

card.name: Silver-Thread Cloak
Aggressor Captain
card.text: Haste Aggressor Captain must attack each combat if able. Whenever a creature you control attacks, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Nomad Shade
card.text: Bestow {2}{w/b} When Nomad Shade enters, you may return target land you control or from your graveyard to your hand. Landfall - Whenever a land enters under your control and Nomad Shade is an aura, you may attach it to target creature. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and flying. Flying

card.name: Precocious Bolt
card.text: You may reveal Precocious Bolt as you draw it. If you do, it deals 1 damage to target player and 1 damage to target creature they control. Then it deals 1 damage to you. Precocious Bolt deals 1 damage to target player and 1 damage to target creature they control.

card.name: Determinate
card.text: The next time target creature or artifact would die or be destroyed this turn, tap it instead.

card.name: Father's Will
card.text: Exile target card from your graveyard. Search the top X cards of your library for a card, where X is the exiled card's mana cost, put it on top of your library, and put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Conniving Pyromiggy
card.text: Haste, Duck - Until end of turn, whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Conniving Pyromiggy deals 1 damage to target player and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Mourning Morning
card.text: Pop-up {1}{b} Draw a card. If a creature you controlled died this turn, draw two cards instead.

card.name: Humble
card.text: Exile target permanent with indestructible or total power and toughness 9 or greater.

card.name: Heel Swipe
card.text: Heel Swipe deals 2 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If it's a creature with toughness 4 or greater, deal 4 damage instead.

card.name: Pick Off
card.text: Deal 3 damage to target creature with base toughness 3 or less.

card.name: Fearful Megafauna
card.text: Trample, Duck - Fearful Megafauna deals 2 damage to each other creature. Whenever a spell or ability you don't control deals damage to Fearful Megafauna, its duck ability activates. Tap it.

card.name: Absorb the Mist
card.text: Spree - {2} - destroy target enchantment. {u} - scry 1, then draw a card.

card.name: Make Amends
card.text: Choose 1- Pay {g}. Target player exiles target enchantment. Pay {1}. Gain 1 life for each enchantment on the battlefield.

card.name: Quad-Palm Jerry
card.text: Quad-Palm Jerry can block an additional creature. {t}, sacrifice a creature with toughness 3 or less: Quad-Palm Jerry deals 2 damage to any target.

card.name: Storm-Seed Fairy
card.text: Flying Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, proliferate or place a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Grit Teeth
card.text: Pop-up {r/g} Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to target creature. It gains deathtouch and trample until end of turn. If X is 3 or more, you lose X life.

card.name: Knowledge Parasite
card.text: Knowledge Parasite's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in the hand of the player with the most cards. Whenever Knowledge Parasite deals combat damage, target player draws a card. {1}{u}{u}: Tap target creature.

card.name: Unstable Hydra
card.text: Bestow {1}{u}{r}, Reveal a card Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery, Unstable Hydra or enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and must be blocked by an additional creature until end of turn.

card.name: Rebellious Cacophany
card.text: Create a 1/1 green and white Rabbit Soldier token with Backup 1. Rivalstorm (Copy this spell for each spell an opponent has cast this turn.)

card.name: Forced Experiment
Insistent Assistant
card.text: Transparent, Prowess Whenever a player casts their second spell that turn, they may exile the top card of their library. If they do, they may cast it until end of turn. When Insistent Assistant enters, target opponent reveals a card.

card.name: Mental Tripwire
card.text: Mental Tripwire costs {1} less to cast for each card in the hand of the opponent it targets. Tap each creature target opponent controls.

card.name: Jealousy Flare
card.text: Jealousy Flare costs {3} less to cast if it's the only card in your hand. Make a Treasure for each card in target opponent's hand.

card.name: Gode the Gloating Goat
card.text: Duck - Goad target craeture. (It must attack each combat, and a player other than you if able.)

card.name: Ravenous Studies
card.text: Exile the top card of your library. You may play it until the end of your next turn. When you do, add {r}. Rivalstorm (Copy this spell for each spell an opponent has cast this turn.)

card.name: Titan of the Grove
card.text: When Titan of the Grove enters, return up to 2 enchantments from your graveyard and attach/bestow them or put them on the battlefield. Backup 1, Backup 1 Deathtouch, Lifelink
